title: Blood Sugar Diabetes Tracker
description:
Take control of your diabetes management with Glucose Diabetes Tracker Gloco Buddy, the comprehensive and easy-to-use app for tracking blood sugar, glucose levels, and more. Designed for people with Type 1, Type 2, and gestational diabetes, our app helps you stay on top of your health every day.

Blood Sugar Glucose Diabetes Tracker Gloco Buddy is your free, loyal diabetes logbook, keeping all your important data in one place and ensuring it stays secure on your mobile device. With our app, you'll enjoy:

- Personalized dashboard to track diet, medications, carb intake, and blood glucose levels.
- Clear blood sugar level graphs for quick insights.
- Diabetes Management Indicator (DMI) for an overview of your health.
- Daily, weekly, and monthly reports you can share directly with your doctor.
- Local data storage on your device, ensuring complete privacy and security.
- Multiple Profiles: Manage multiple user profiles from a single app/device.


APP FEATURES
Easily log your daily therapy info, including meals, diet, carb intake, medications, blood glucose levels, and insulin doses. All your data is stored securely on your device, so you can manage your health with confidence.

PRO FEATURES
Upgrade to Glucose Diabetes Tracker Gloco Buddy PRO for advanced diabetes management tools. Available with a monthly or yearly subscription, PRO 

features include:
Smart search: Build a searchable database of meals, activities, tags, and more.
 
PDF & Excel reports: Save or print all your data for you or your doctor.
 
Blood glucose reminders: Never forget to check and log your levels.

Multiple Profiles: Manage multiple user profiles from a single app/device.

Basal rates: Perfect for pump users.



Download Blood Sugar Glucose Diabetes Tracker Gloco Buddy today! Monitor, control, and manage your diabetes effortlessly. Keep all your medical information on your smartphone, ready to be used whenever you need it. Stay on top of your health, manage your carbs and medication intake, and avoid hypers and hypos with ease.

SUPPORT
Have a question, suggestion, or need help? We're here for you!
email: techtiq.app@gmail.com


Terms URL: https://techtiq.xyz/glucobuddy/tnc/
Privacy Policy URL: https://techtiq.xyz/glucobuddy/privacy-policy/


Upgrading to Glucose Diabetes Tracker Gloco Buddy PRO will charge your play store account. Your subscription automatically renews unless canceled at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Manage your subscription and auto-renewal options in your play store settings after purchase.

Glucose Diabetes Tracker Gloco Buddy supports your diabetes treatment but cannot replace professional medical advice. Regular check-ups with your healthcare provider are essential for long-term blood sugar management.
